Uses of Class
playn.core.gl.GLContext

  • Packages that use GLContext 
    Package Description
    playn.core  
    playn.core.gl  

    • Uses of GLContext in playn.core

      Methods in playn.core that return GLContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GLContext Graphics.ctx()
      Returns the GL context on platforms that use GL, null otherwise.

    • Uses of GLContext in playn.core.gl

      Subclasses of GLContext in playn.core.gl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GL20Context
      A GLContext implementation based on GL20.
      Methods in playn.core.gl with parameters of type GLContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean QuadShader.isLikelyToPerform(GLContext ctx)
      Returns false if the GL context doesn't support sufficient numbers of vertex uniform vectors to allow this shader to run with good performance, true otherwise.
